attributes.action: Give civil servants a fair pay rise especially those who are on old contracts
attributes.background: Within NOMS and the MOJ staff who refused to move over to new terms and conditions have not received a pay rise whilst those who did have received one. This is unfair and is blackmail to all civil servants who refuse and can not afford to move to new terms & conditions due to how much they will lose

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take on civil service pay.
